Blog.post: urlLink Have I posted this one already? It's worth publishing again and again. This was taken in front of my friend, Cara's, house. urlLink
urlLink As many times as I have seen this picture, I've never noticed the slobber spot on the pillow until now. That's kinda gross. urlLink
urlLink I just have to laugh urlLink
urlLink Matt and Evan at Evan's 6th birthday urlLink
urlLink We set the camera up on his trash can so we could get some pictures of ourselves. urlLink

urlLink This is Matt at his Dad's wedding. When I first saw him in that tux, I nearly melted! Could he be any more handsome? urlLink
urlLink Evan's school picture 2004 urlLink
urlLink Evan and Dixie. This was taken as we were loading up the cars to leave NC to come back to Atlanta. urlLink

I think that this pic was taken at my sister's reception. Wehad a bunch of disposable cameras for the guests touse, and I think thatthis came fromone of those. Iswear, every picture of these two is frame-worthy! I just love them! urlLink
urlLink Matt and Me urlLink We took this photo in January 2004 at Angela's birthday party.

urlLink So, I guess I have to start typing down here. OK. So be it. Now, this picture was taken in Foscoe,NC at my parents' mountain house on the weekend of my sister's wedding. We all had a blast, as Evan can attest. Matt and Evan urlLink
urlLink I just don't get it. urlLink
urlLink We could get arrested for this, I'm sure. urlLink
urlLink My puppy channel urlLink

I heard urlLink this story on NPR last week. I think a puppy channel is a great idea, although I don't even have to turn on the TV to get laughable dog antics in my house. I think it would kind of be like the weather channel, though. I turn on the weather channel, not so much for weather info, but I find it eerily soothing. This guy's idea was to have a channel that would make people happy. Puppies, he found, make people happy.
urlLink Hi! It's Me! urlLink
urlLink We were soldiers My Dad is on the far right, and that is Lt. Col. Hal Moore in the middle. urlLink
urlLink This is Dad, Mom, and I at my cousin, Caroline's, wedding Sept 2003 We were pretty exhausted urlLink
urlLink Beth Geddes urlLink

urlLink She really is a looker. Good thing I fixed her, not that there was anything wrong with her. urlLink

urlLink My only professional photo shoot. Got my hair done for free! urlLink

Why'd ya have to go and make things so complicated? ...Gettin' me frustrated! Life's like this! I suppose boys have the same effect on her that computers have on me. Web pages and Blogs will be the bane of my existence, so why do I keep coming back for more?
